p:
Molecular descriptors express the pharmacokinetic, pharmacodynamic and physicochemical effects of all newly synthesised targets 3, 6, 8 and 9. The lipophilicity (milogP) and topological polar surface area (tPSA) were measured using the online Molinspiration software
37 while the drug score, drug-likeness and aqueous solubility were evaluated via the OSIRIS property explorer software
38 . Furthermore, good bioavailability is more preferable for targets having TPSA of ≤140 Å 2 and ≤10 rotatable bonds
39 .
